strings.Value: "Why did you leave your home? Do any traveling bards ever live happily ever after? Or did you hope to earn your glory, singing songs in taverns?"

"Heh, you don't appreciate your happiness! You've been surrounded by books, paintings, poets and singers since you were a child... In our village the only entertainments we had were tavern fights and harvest dance parties! I'd have died of boredom if I'd stayed there!"
